subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: The Michigan State juniors Branden Dawson, a tenacious rebounder and presence around the rim, and Travis Trice, a willing passer with deep shooting range, started playing together in seventh grade.
snippet: The Michigan State juniors Branden Dawson, a tenacious rebounder and presence around the rim, and Travis Trice, a willing passer with deep shooting range, started playing together in seventh grade.
